summary:

As of now the new upload is working 100%, you can see in the screenshot that the new helmet is heavy and enchantable, enjoy :)

EDIT:
Sorry for anyone that downloaded the first file, I uploaded the wrong one that still had enchantment, the new one is corrected.

This mod will ADD a new helmet (not change!) called Nightingale HEAVY, y
descriptionHtml:
EDIT:

Last upload fixes unable to \"upgrade\" the item through the workbench.  You can now craft, enchant and upgrade Nightingale Heavy.  This will be the last upload as I have not seen any problems with it.  Look at screenshots to see it in action.

This mod will ADD a new helmet (not change!) called Nightingale HEAVY, you can craft it at any blacksmith by using 5 Ebony ingots and 3 leather.

this mod will NOT change your old Nightingale hood at all.  It will however add a completely new helmet called Nightingale Heavy which you can enchant and counts as HEAVY armor.

To craft Nightingale Heavy you must go to any blacksmith and select the Ebony tab, you will see the option to create Nightingale Heavy under the EBONY tab.
author: sirxazor
